trigger_description: This trigger fires when the Hearing Aid is turned On.
This Trigger fires when the Bluetooth connection between the Hearing Aid and Mobile is re-established.
This Trigger fires when the Hearing Aid is muted or unmuted.
This Trigger fires when the volume is changed on the Hearing Aid.
This Trigger fires when the Bluetooth connection between the Hearing Aid and Mobile Phone is lost.
This Trigger fires when the battery gets low on the Hearing Aid.
This Trigger fires when a program changes on the Hearing Aid.
